about_the_game:
"What The Gravity" plunges you into an interstellar battleground as a delivery specialist on a singular mission: delivering vital supplies to beleaguered ally outposts. This thrilling sci-fi adventure demands resourceful evasion skills as you navigate treacherous asteroid fields and dodge laser beams while evading long-range sniper rifle shots.

Your space suit is more than mere armor; it's your lifeline, and prudent resource management is vital. Master the art of evasion to outsmart relentless foes in this gripping journey that will test your strategic choices and decision-making skills.

In "What The Gravity," not all battles are fought with guns. Will you rise to the challenge and deliver hope to those in need, or will you succumb to the chaos of interstellar warfare? In space, sometimes, it's not about fighting; it's about surviving. Run, just run, and become the hero the universe needs.

In "What The Gravity," not all battles are fought with guns. Will you rise to the challenge and deliver hope to those in need, or will you succumb to the chaos of interstellar warfare? name: What The Gravity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1050
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change as development furthers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia RTX 3060
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change as development furthers

short_description: Prepare for the electrifying space adventure as a delivery specialist in the legendary United Space Force (USF). Embark on a high-octane delivery run, navigating treacherous space battlefields, and defying all odds to ensure the success of your critical mission - before the beer gets warm.
